name: Sled Gunner
description:
Made for the ACM Winter Game Jam 2022. (I might have misinterpreted the prompt)

A simple ragdoll, gunner game. Just get to the other side of the map and don't die!

There are a few missing features, janks, etc.

WASD (torque controls; sled is semi-controlled)
Mouse (LMB + RMB)

Money is gained by destroying that one target, collecting coins, and gunning down enemies.
